automatons

Class AdminAutomaton

  • java.lang.Object
    • automatons.AdminAutomaton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAutomaton

    public class AdminAutomaton
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAutomaton
    AdminAutomaton is the Automaton factoring and sending administrator-related instructions

    An AdminAutomaton instance is characterized by the following :

    • A port on which it should connect: 6669
    • A ClientTCP providing server/client connection and communication
    • A serverAnswer collecting the answer of the server after sending the instruction
    Author:
    Quentin Ducasse
    See Also:
    IAutomaton

        password - The account password
        name - The subscriber name
        address - The subscriber address
